title: The Silver Sword
description: Librarian's Note: this is an alternate cover edition for 0140301461 (ISBN13: 9780140301465).Jan opened his wooden box and took out the silver sword. ‘This will bring me luck,’ he said to Mr Balicki. ‘And it will bring you luck because you gave it to me.’The silver sword is only a paper knife, but it gives Jan and his friends hope. Hungry, cold, and afraid, the four children try to stay alive among the ruins of bombed cities in war-torn Europe. Soon they will begin the long and dangerous journey south, from Poland to Switzerland, where they hope to find their parents again.The silver sword became the symbol of hope and courage which kept four deserted and starving children alive through the years of occupation, and afterwards on the search to find their parents, and is based on a true story.
author: John Escott
